column13: at different times i have seen the guides engage with panhandlers in a peaceful manner to get them to be less aggressive at that is a comforting thought to me that they take care of that so that police dont necessarily have to be the ones trying to take care of potentially minor issues. one particular instance of the guides going above and beyond their call of duty was once when we had bio-matter in one of our doorways (i cant remember if it was blood or urine) we could not get a maintenance team to get down here to help us (it was a weekend or govt holiday). after a second call to hospitality someone came down with some high-level cleaner and took care of it for us. that was an amazing thing to do
